Share: Digg Facebook StumbleUpon Updated - Crop Formation Reported in Zabno, Poland © 2004 by Linda Moulton Howe Zabno, Poland near Moglino (yellow) and west of Warsaw is location for the country's first crop formation this year reported in wheat on May 15, 2004. May 17, 2004 Zabno, Poland - Robert K. Lesniakiewicz, Vice President of the CBUFOIZA (researchers in Poland who investigate unidentified aerial objects and crop formations), has e-mailed me his recent report along with photographs of a crop formation found in wheat near Moglino (yellow) and Zabno west of Warsaw on May 15, 2004. This is the first for Poland this year after three other formations have been discovered in England in East Sussex, Hertfordshire and Wiltshire counties. (See: More Information below.) Robert reports, "Some UFOs were seen above such places as Rzeszow, Kowale Oleckie and Wloclawek." All photographs © 2004 by Mr. Adam Piekut. Crop formation in wheat reported in Zabno, Poland, on May 15, 2004. All photograph © 2004 by Adam Piekut.

May 15, 2004 wheat formation in Zabno, Poland, west of Warsaw. Length measured 36.5 meters (120 feet) and width 27.4 meters (90 feet). Diagram © 2004 by Michal Osesek, CBUFOiZA. More Information: English Formations in May 2004 Simple circle in yellow flowering oilseed rape discovered on May 1, 2004, at Bishop Cannings Down, Wiltshire, England. Muddy, wet soil conditions have prevented field investigation. Photograph © 2004 by Nick Nicholson. See: http://www.cropcircle conne ctor.com Vesica Pisces variation discovered in very wet field of flowering oil seed rape at Icknield Way, near Pegsdon, Hertfordshire. Estimated length, 300 to 400 feet. Aerial photograph © 2004 by Andrew King.

Tegdown Hill, Patcham, near Brighton, East Sussex, England. Third crop formation since May 1, reported on May 9, 2004. Aerial photograph © 2004 by David Russell.
